analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Dvīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṁ viharati avighātaṁ anupāyāsaṁ apariḷāhaṁ;
analyzed: dvīhi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgataḥ bhikkhu diṭṭhe iva dhamme sukham viharati avighātam an upāyāsam a pariḷāha

original: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā.
analyzed: kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā

original: Indriyesu guttadvāratāya ca, bhojane mattaññutāya ca.
analyzed: indriyesu gutta dvāra tāya ca bhojane mattaññu tāya ca

original: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvīhi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu diṭṭheva dhamme sukhaṁ viharati avighātaṁ anupāyāsaṁ apariḷāhaṁ;
analyzed: imehi kho bhikkhave dvīhi dhammehi samannāgataḥ bhikkhu diṭṭhe iva dhamme sukham viharati avighātam an upāyāsam a pariḷāha

original: kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
analyzed: kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhāti

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
